problem:
A line is parameterized by
\[\begin{pmatrix} x \\ y \end{pmatrix} = \begin{pmatrix} 6 \\ 7 \end{pmatrix} + t \begin{pmatrix} 2 \\ -8 \end{pmatrix}.\]A second line is parameterized by
\[\begin{pmatrix} x \\ y \end{pmatrix} = \begin{pmatrix} 9 \\ 10 \end{pmatrix} + u \begin{pmatrix} a \\ -8 \end{pmatrix}.\]If the two lines do not intersect, then find $a.$
